item.title: Two DNFs at Moab 240 haven't broken me, they've sharpened my resolve. See you crazies soon. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #moab240 #runtok
item.description: Two DNFs at Moab 240 haven't broken me, they've sharpened my resolve. See you crazies soon. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #moab240 #runtok

item.title: Five minutes on ABC7 LA talking about ultrarunning with @abc7tony and @abc7irene, and I was nervous the entire time. Way outside my comfort zone. But that's exactly why I said yes. We don't grow by staying comfortable. We grow by doing the hard things tha
item.description: Five minutes on ABC7 LA talking about ultrarunning with @abc7tony and @abc7irene, and I was nervous the entire time. Way outside my comfort zone. But that's exactly why I said yes. We don't grow by staying comfortable. We grow by doing the hard things tha

item.title: Why does it look like I'm wearing a bikini bottom? Still not sponsored by Hoka, but so many of you wanted to know my thoughts on the 10s. I know it's not data filled, but I know what I like and what feels good on my feet. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.
item.description: Why does it look like I'm wearing a bikini bottom? Still not sponsored by Hoka, but so many of you wanted to know my thoughts on the 10s. I know it's not data filled, but I know what I like and what feels good on my feet. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.

item.title: TL;DR: Garmin and Strava are fighting over who gets credit for your workout data, threatening to break the connection that makes both platforms useful. Garmin updated their API guidelines requiring their logo on all activities uploaded to Strava. Strava r
item.description: TL;DR: Garmin and Strava are fighting over who gets credit for your workout data, threatening to break the connection that makes both platforms useful. Garmin updated their API guidelines requiring their logo on all activities uploaded to Strava. Strava r

item.title: That was hard. Good luck to everyone running Saddles 100 tomorrow. I did it the first year and it was an adventure. I started it on 3 hours of sleep which made it extra challenging. #saddles100 #runtok
item.description: That was hard. Good luck to everyone running Saddles 100 tomorrow. I did it the first year and it was an adventure. I started it on 3 hours of sleep which made it extra challenging. #saddles100 #runtok

item.title: Presales go live next week. After months of writing, editing, and pouring my story onto pages, we're finally here. The book that documents the good, the bad, and the ugly, all of it, is almost ready for you. What's next: Still recording the audiobook (bec
item.description: Presales go live next week. After months of writing, editing, and pouring my story onto pages, we're finally here. The book that documents the good, the bad, and the ugly, all of it, is almost ready for you. What's next: Still recording the audiobook (bec

item.title: Luck is the last dying wish of the unprepared. Last week was terrible. Good. This week will be better. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok
item.description: Luck is the last dying wish of the unprepared. Last week was terrible. Good. This week will be better. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok

item.title: One year ago, I recorded this video right after my second DNF at Moab 240. Raw. Disappointed. Questioning everything. You can hear it in my voice - the frustration of coming back for round two and still not finishing. The weight of knowing I'd have to dec
item.description: One year ago, I recorded this video right after my second DNF at Moab 240. Raw. Disappointed. Questioning everything. You can hear it in my voice - the frustration of coming back for round two and still not finishing. The weight of knowing I'd have to dec

item.title: Dropbags will be minimal this year. Mostly creature comforts. Big thanks to my mom for the scones. Lube is salty britches Calories are going to be phun bars, precision, never second and spring. Different miles has me craving different things. I'll probab
item.description: Dropbags will be minimal this year. Mostly creature comforts. Big thanks to my mom for the scones. Lube is salty britches Calories are going to be phun bars, precision, never second and spring. Different miles has me craving different things. I'll probab

item.title: the white whale is no more#runtok #moab240

item.title: Moab 240 put my feet through absolute hell. Rain, rivers, streams, endless mud. My feet were never dry. Not once. For 98 hours. But my overall foot strategy worked: 1.) KT tape around the toes 2.) @getsaltybritches lube coating my entire foot 3.) @feeture
item.description: Moab 240 put my feet through absolute hell. Rain, rivers, streams, endless mud. My feet were never dry. Not once. For 98 hours. But my overall foot strategy worked: 1.) KT tape around the toes 2.) @getsaltybritches lube coating my entire foot 3.) @feeture

item.title: Pretty sure that's trench foot on my big toe. I did retape my feet often, relube them with Salty Britches, new socks. I used the same shoes the whole time. Hoka Challenger 8s. Seems nothing survived. #moab240 #runtok
item.description: Pretty sure that's trench foot on my big toe. I did retape my feet often, relube them with Salty Britches, new socks. I used the same shoes the whole time. Hoka Challenger 8s. Seems nothing survived. #moab240 #runtok

item.title: Lost 13 pounds and my mind, but finished the race. And spoiler alert, it was hard. hope you enjoy a window into my soul for 98 hours of forward motion. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #moab240
item.description: Lost 13 pounds and my mind, but finished the race. And spoiler alert, it was hard. hope you enjoy a window into my soul for 98 hours of forward motion. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #moab240

item.title: I really appreciate you all Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #moab240
item.description: I really appreciate you all Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #moab240

item.title: Not sponsored. Just my thoughts after 240 miles in mud, rivers, rain, and desert. #runtok #moab240
item.description: Not sponsored. Just my thoughts after 240 miles in mud, rivers, rain, and desert. #runtok #moab240

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
